item.description: With the recent uprisings in Africa for more democratic regimes, today's political climate is begging for a socialist alternative to the capitalist rule in North Africa, the United States, and other localities around the world.  Greg Pason, the National Secretary of the National Committee of the Socialist Party USA, will be speaking this Saturday on the need for an active socialist movement in the US, and the need for SP members to become more active in our outreach.
item.why: Greg Pason will be speaking on the need for an active socialist movement in the US and abroad
item.name: Forum with Greg Pason, National Secretary of the Socialist Party USA
